favourite.article: Phil. 3:8 But moreover I also count all things to be loss on account of the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, on account of whom I have suffered the loss of all things and count them as refuse that I may gain Christ 3:9 And be found in Him,
Nada se compara a ti Señor!! Te amo Señor Jesus, Precioso Jesus!!
Who could die to save a sinner like me? No one and nothing compares You O Lord! I love You!!!! I just love You Lord Jesus!
Yes Lord, nothing compares to You. I love You, dear Lord Jesus!
Lord Jesus I love You with all my heart.
Thank You Lord that NOTHING compares to You!
Lord, You are the lovely One, nothing compares to You!
Amen, Lord! Oh Lord Jesus, nothing and no one can satisfy me but You, oh Lord. Cause me to love You. Occupy my inner being, Lord! Oh Lord Jesus, Amen!
Jesus Lord I love You and none other can compare to You. I love this song. Oh! Lord Jesus, I love You. You are life to me and EVERYTHING. Hallelujah!
I love this song because it always reminds me to love the Lord more and more each day.Lord!!!!! Your so Precious. No other one compares to you
